clavisterStatsMibModule.name: clavisterStatsMibModule

revisions.description: Added values for memory usage and TCP buffer usage
Extending the mib by adding more statistics values

clavisterStatsMibModule.contactinfo: Clavister Support Box 393 SE-891 28 ORNSKOLDSVIK SWEDEN Tel: +46-660-299200 E-mail: support@clavister.com http://www.clavister.com
clavisterStatsMibModule.description: The MIB module for Clavister CorePlus products.

clvSysBuffUse.name: clvSysBuffUse
clvSysBuffUse.description: The current number of buffers in use.

clvSysPscTcpSyn.name: clvSysPscTcpSyn
clvSysPscTcpSyn.description: Number of TCP connections in the SYN state.

clvSysPscTcpOpen.name: clvSysPscTcpOpen
clvSysPscTcpOpen.description: Number of TCP connections in the OPEN state.

clvSysPscTcpFin.name: clvSysPscTcpFin
clvSysPscTcpFin.description: Number of TCP connections in the FIN state.

clvIfStatsTable.name: clvIfStatsTable
clvIfStatsTable.description: A table of Clavister specific interfaces statistics

clvIfStatsEntry.name: clvIfStatsEntry
clvIfStatsEntry.description: The row in a table of Clavister specific interface statistics

clvIfStatsIndex.name: clvIfStatsIndex
clvIfStatsIndex.description: Index of a row in clvSysIfStatsTable

clvIfFragsIn.name: clvIfFragsIn
clvIfFragsIn.description: Number of IP packet fragments received in the interface.

clvIfFragReassOk.name: clvIfFragReassOk
clvIfFragReassOk.description: Number of complete IP packets successfully reassembled from the fragments received in the interface.

clvIfFragReassFail.name: clvIfFragReassFail
clvIfFragReassFail.description: Number of packets that could not be reassembled, either due to resource starvation, illegal fragmentation, or just packet loss.

clvIfPktsInCnt.name: clvIfPktsInCnt
clvIfPktsInCnt.description: Number of packets received by the interface.

clvIfPktsOutCnt.name: clvIfPktsOutCnt
clvIfPktsOutCnt.description: Number of packets sent by the interface

clvIfBitsInCnt.name: clvIfBitsInCnt
clvIfBitsInCnt.description: Number of bits received by the interface

clvIfBitsOutCnt.name: clvIfBitsOutCnt
clvIfBitsOutCnt.description: Number of bits sent by the interface

clvIfPktsTotCnt.name: clvIfPktsTotCnt
clvIfPktsTotCnt.description: Totat number of packets transmited by the interface

clvIfBitsTotCnt.name: clvIfBitsTotCnt
clvIfBitsTotCnt.description: Totat number of bits transmited by the interface

clvIfRxRingTable.name: clvIfRxRingTable
clvIfRxRingTable.description: A table of Clavister specific interface Rx ring statistics

clvIfRxRingEntry.name: clvIfRxRingEntry
clvIfRxRingEntry.description: The row in a table of Clavister specific interface Rx ring statistics.

clvIfRxRingIndex.name: clvIfRxRingIndex
clvIfRxRingIndex.description: Index of a row in clvIfRxRingTable.

clvIfRxRingFifoErrors.name: clvIfRxRingFifoErrors
clvIfRxRingFifoErrors.description: Rx Ring number of FIFO errors.

clvIfRxDespools.name: clvIfRxDespools
clvIfRxDespools.description: Number of despool events per second.

clvIfRxRingSaturation.name: clvIfRxRingSaturation
clvIfRxRingSaturation.description: Rx Ring sturation. Percentage of ring use per despool event when the ring has been more than half full.

clvRxRingFlooded.name: clvRxRingFlooded
clvRxRingFlooded.description: Rx Ring number of despool events for which the ring has been completely flooded

clvIfTxRingTable.name: clvIfTxRingTable
clvIfTxRingTable.description: A table of Clavister specific interface Tx ring statistics

clvIfTxRingEntry.name: clvIfTxRingEntry
clvIfTxRingEntry.description: The row in a table of Clavister specific interface Tx ring statistics.

clvIfTxRingIndex.name: clvIfTxRingIndex
clvIfTxRingIndex.description: Index of a row in clvIfRxRingTable.

clvIfTxDespools.name: clvIfTxDespools
clvIfTxDespools.description: Tx Ring number of despool event per second (polls when there is at least one buffer in the ring)

clvIfTxAvgUse.name: clvIfTxAvgUse
clvIfTxAvgUse.description: Tx Ring number of despool events when the ring has been completely flooded

clvIfTxRingSaturation.name: clvIfTxRingSaturation
clvIfTxRingSaturation.description: Tx Ring percentage of use per despool event when the ring has been more than half full.

clvRxTingFlooded.name: clvRxTingFlooded
clvRxTingFlooded.description: Tx Ring number of despool events for in which the ring has been completely flooded

clvIfVlanStatsTable.name: clvIfVlanStatsTable
clvIfVlanStatsTable.description: A table of Clavister VLAN statistics

clvIfVlanStatsEntry.name: clvIfVlanStatsEntry
clvIfVlanStatsEntry.description: The row in a table of clvIfVlanStatsTable. Each has an index equal to the ifIndex of the corresponding physical interface

clvIfVlanIndex.name: clvIfVlanIndex
clvIfVlanIndex.description: Extended index of a row in clvIfVlanStatsTable.

clvIfVlanUntaggedInPkts.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedInPkts
clvIfVlanUntaggedInPkts.description: Number of untaged packets untagged packets received by the interface.

clvIfVlanUntaggedOutPkts.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedOutPkts
clvIfVlanUntaggedOutPkts.description: Number of untagged packets sent by the interface.

clvIfVlanUntaggedTotPkts.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedTotPkts
clvIfVlanUntaggedTotPkts.description: Total number of untagged packets processed by the interface.

clvIfVlanUntaggedInOctets.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedInOctets
clvIfVlanUntaggedInOctets.description: Total number of octects in untagged packets received by the interface.

clvIfVlanUntaggedOutOctets.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedOutOctets
clvIfVlanUntaggedOutOctets.description: Total number of octects in untagged packets sent by the interface.

clvIfVlanUntaggedTotOctets.name: clvIfVlanUntaggedTotOctets
clvIfVlanUntaggedTotOctets.description: Total number of octects in untagged packets processed by the interface.

clvHWSensorEntry.name: clvHWSensorEntry
clvHWSensorEntry.description: Entry of table of hardware sensors.

clvHWSensorIndex.name: clvHWSensorIndex
clvHWSensorIndex.description: Index of the entries of the sensor table.

clvHWSensorUnit.name: clvHWSensorUnit
clvHWSensorUnit.description: The description of the unit of the value mesured by sensor.

clvSysTimerUsage.name: clvSysTimerUsage
clvSysTimerUsage.description: The current number of timers in use.

clvIPsecPhaseOneAggrModeDone.name: clvIPsecPhaseOneAggrModeDone
clvIPsecPhaseOneAggrModeDone.description: Number of Phase-1 aggressive mode negotiations.

clvIPsecQuickModeActive.name: clvIPsecQuickModeActive
clvIPsecQuickModeActive.description: Number of quick mode active negotiations.

clvIPsecQuickModeDone.name: clvIPsecQuickModeDone
clvIPsecQuickModeDone.description: Number of quick mode negotiations done.

clvIPsecQuickModeFailed.name: clvIPsecQuickModeFailed
clvIPsecQuickModeFailed.description: Number of quick mode negotiations failed.

clvIPsecInfoDone.name: clvIPsecInfoDone
clvIPsecInfoDone.description: Number of informational exchanges done. (Not available in IKEv1 implementations)

clvIPsecInfoFailed.name: clvIPsecInfoFailed
clvIPsecInfoFailed.description: Number of informational exchanges failed. (Not available in IKEv1 implementations)

clvIPsecTotalTransforms.name: clvIPsecTotalTransforms
clvIPsecTotalTransforms.description: Total number of transform records created.

clvIPsecOutOfTransforms.name: clvIPsecOutOfTransforms
clvIPsecOutOfTransforms.description: Number of packets dropped due to no available transform object. (Not available in IKEv1 implementations)

clvRuleUseTable.name: clvRuleUseTable
clvRuleUseTable.description: A list of general rules usage statistics.

clvRuleUseEntry.name: clvRuleUseEntry
clvRuleUseEntry.description: The statistics over a rule usage.

clvRuleUse.name: clvRuleUse
clvRuleUse.description: The number of times o rule was used.

clvIPPoolEntry.name: clvIPPoolEntry
clvIPPoolEntry.description: The attributes of an ip pool

clvIPPoolPrepare.name: clvIPPoolPrepare
clvIPPoolPrepare.description: Number of IP pool objects in prepare mode.

clvIPPoolFree.name: clvIPPoolFree
clvIPPoolFree.description: Number of available IPs in the pool.

clvIPPoolMisses.name: clvIPPoolMisses
clvIPPoolMisses.description: Mumber of missed IP pool negotiations for other reasons than lack of available IP numbers.

clvIPPoolClientFails.name: clvIPPoolClientFails
clvIPPoolClientFails.description: Number of failed IP pool transactions.

clvIPPoolUsed.name: clvIPPoolUsed
clvIPPoolUsed.description: Number of IP numbers in use from the pool.

clvDHCPTotalRejected.name: clvDHCPTotalRejected
clvDHCPTotalRejected.description: Total number of rejected packets (all rules).

clvDHCPRuleTable.name: clvDHCPRuleTable
clvDHCPRuleTable.description: A list of all DHCP server rules usage statistics.

clvDHCPRuleEntry.name: clvDHCPRuleEntry
clvDHCPRuleEntry.description: The attributes of a DHCP server rule statistics.

clvDHCPRuleUsage.name: clvDHCPRuleUsage
clvDHCPRuleUsage.description: Number of used IPs in the pool.

clvDHCPRuleUsagePercent.name: clvDHCPRuleUsagePercent
clvDHCPRuleUsagePercent.description: The percentage of the used IPs in relation to the IP pool size.

clvDHCPActiveClientsPercent.name: clvDHCPActiveClientsPercent
clvDHCPActiveClientsPercent.description: The number of currently active clients as a percentage of the pool size.

clvDHCPRejectedRequests.name: clvDHCPRejectedRequests
clvDHCPRejectedRequests.description: Number of rejected requests matching the current rule.

clvDHCPTotalLeases.name: clvDHCPTotalLeases
clvDHCPTotalLeases.description: Total number of leases in the pool.

clvUserAuthHTTPUsers.name: clvUserAuthHTTPUsers
clvUserAuthHTTPUsers.description: Number of currently logged in HTTP users.

clvUserAuthXAUTHUsers.name: clvUserAuthXAUTHUsers
clvUserAuthXAUTHUsers.description: Number of currently logged in XAUTH users.

clvUserAuthHTTPSUsers.name: clvUserAuthHTTPSUsers
clvUserAuthHTTPSUsers.description: Number of currently logged in HTTPS users.

clvUserAuthPPPUsers.name: clvUserAuthPPPUsers
clvUserAuthPPPUsers.description: Number of currently logged in PPP users.

clvUserAuthEAPUsers.name: clvUserAuthEAPUsers
clvUserAuthEAPUsers.description: Number of currently logged in EAP users.

clvUserAuthRuleUseTable.name: clvUserAuthRuleUseTable
clvUserAuthRuleUseTable.description: Table of user authentication rule usage.

clvUserAuthRuleUseEntry.name: clvUserAuthRuleUseEntry
clvUserAuthRuleUseEntry.description: The attributes of an authentication rule usage statistics.

clvUserAuthRuleUse.name: clvUserAuthRuleUse
clvUserAuthRuleUse.description: The number of times o rule was used.

clvLinkMonGrp.name: clvLinkMonGrp
clvLinkMonGrp.description: The number of groups of monitored links

clvLinkMonGrpEntry.name: clvLinkMonGrpEntry
clvLinkMonGrpEntry.description: The attributes of a link monitor group

clvLinkMonGrpIndex.name: clvLinkMonGrpIndex
clvLinkMonGrpIndex.description: The index row in the table of link monitor groups.

clvLinkMonHostTable.name: clvLinkMonHostTable
clvLinkMonHostTable.description: Table of link monitored hosts in a link monnitor group.

clvLinkMonHostEntry.name: clvLinkMonHostEntry
clvLinkMonHostEntry.description: The attributes of a monitored host.

clvLinkMonHostIndex.name: clvLinkMonHostIndex
clvLinkMonHostIndex.description: The index an host in the table of link monitor hosts.

clvLinkMonHostShortTermLoss.name: clvLinkMonHostShortTermLoss
clvLinkMonHostShortTermLoss.description: The percentage of short term losst packets.

clvLinkMonHostPacketsLost.name: clvLinkMonHostPacketsLost
clvLinkMonHostPacketsLost.description: Total number of lost monitoring packets.

clvPipeUsers.name: clvPipeUsers
clvPipeUsers.description: The current number of users, as defined by the grouping settings of each pipe, being tracked in the pipes system. Note that this value corresponds to the number of users active in each time slice of 1/20th of a second, and not to the number of users having open connections.

clvPipeEntry.name: clvPipeEntry
clvPipeEntry.description: A entry of the pipes table

clvPipeMinPrec.name: clvPipeMinPrec
clvPipeMinPrec.description: The minimum of the range of pipe precedences.

clvPipeMaxPrec.name: clvPipeMaxPrec
clvPipeMaxPrec.description: The maximum of the range of pipe precedences.

clvPipeDefPrec.name: clvPipeDefPrec
clvPipeDefPrec.description: The precedence assigned to a packet for which has not one allready done by a Pipe Rule.

clvPipeNumUsers.name: clvPipeNumUsers
clvPipeNumUsers.description: The current number of users, as defined by the grouping settings of each pipe, being tracked in the pipes system. This value corresponds to the number of users active in each time slice and not to the number of users having open connections.

clvPipeCurrentBps.name: clvPipeCurrentBps
clvPipeCurrentBps.description: The current throughput of a pipe, in bits per second, as a sum of the corresponding values for all precedences.

clvPipeCurrentPps.name: clvPipeCurrentPps
clvPipeCurrentPps.description: The current throughput of a pipe, in packets per second, as a sum of the corresponding values for all precedences.

clvPipeDelayedPackets.name: clvPipeDelayedPackets
clvPipeDelayedPackets.description: The number of times packets have been delayed as a result of a pipe, or pipe user having used up its allotted bandwidth. Note that one single packet may be delayed several times; if a pipe is really full, this count may exceed the number of packets actually passing through the pipe.

clvPipeDropedPackets.name: clvPipeDropedPackets
clvPipeDropedPackets.description: The number of packets dropped by a pipe. Packets are dropped when CorePlus is running out of packet buffers. This occurs when excessive amounts of packets need to be queued for later delivery. The packet dropped is always the one that has been queued the longest time globally, which means that the connection suffering from packet loss will be the one most overloading the system.

clvPipePrecTable.name: clvPipePrecTable
clvPipePrecTable.description: There is a one to many relation between a pipe and its precedences. The number of precedences is a instance attribute of each pipe. This table extends the pipes table in order to express the relation between a pipe and the respective precedences.

clvPipePrecEntry.name: clvPipePrecEntry
clvPipePrecEntry.description: An entry of the table of pipe pecedences. These table entries are chracterized by been indexed by two values. The first index the same as the pipe index of the corresponding row in table of pipes and the second index is the index of the set of precedences of the corresponding pipe.

clvPipePrecIndex.name: clvPipePrecIndex
clvPipePrecIndex.description: Index of a precedence of a specific pipe. This is the second index of the entries of pipe precedence table described by object clvPipePrecEntry.

clvPipePrecBps.name: clvPipePrecBps
clvPipePrecBps.description: The current throughput of the pipe, in bits per second, with the corresponding precedence.

clvPipePrecTotalPps.name: clvPipePrecTotalPps
clvPipePrecTotalPps.description: The current throughput of the pipe precedence, in packets per second.

clvPipePrecReservedBps.name: clvPipePrecReservedBps
clvPipePrecReservedBps.description: The current bandwidth allocated to the precedence.

clvPipePrecDynLimBps.name: clvPipePrecDynLimBps
clvPipePrecDynLimBps.description: The current bandwidth limit limit applied the precedence.

clvPipePrecDynUsrLimBps.name: clvPipePrecDynUsrLimBps
clvPipePrecDynUsrLimBps.description: The current precedence bandwidth limit per user of the pipe.

clvPipePrecDelayedPackets.name: clvPipePrecDelayedPackets
clvPipePrecDelayedPackets.description: The number of times packets have been delayed as a result of a precedence, or pipe user having used up its allotted bandwidth. Note that one single packet may be delayed several times; if a pipe is really full, this count may exceed the number of packets of this precedence actually passing through the pipe.

clvPipePrecDropedPackets.name: clvPipePrecDropedPackets
clvPipePrecDropedPackets.description: The number of pipe dropped packets with the corresponding precedence.

clvHttpAlgEntry.name: clvHttpAlgEntry
clvHttpAlgEntry.description: A row of the table of HTTP ALG objects.

clvHttpAlgIndex.description: The index of an entry of the Table of HTTP ALG objects.

clvHttpAlgName.name: clvHttpAlgName

clvHttpAlgTotalBlocked.name: clvHttpAlgTotalBlocked

clvHttpAlgCntFltTable.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltTable

clvHttpAlgCntFltEntry.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltEntry
clvHttpAlgCntFltEntry.description: Entry of the table of HTTP ALG content filtering rules.

clvHttpAlgCntFltIndex.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltIndex
clvHttpAlgCntFltIndex.description: The index of an entry of the Table of HTTP ALG content filtering objects.

clvHttpAlgCntFltName.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltName
clvHttpAlgCntFltName.description: The name of the a HTTP ALG content fitering.

clvHttpAlgCntFltRequests.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltRequests
clvHttpAlgCntFltRequests.description: Total number of URLs intercepted by a content filtering object.

clvHttpAlgCntFltAllowed.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltAllowed
clvHttpAlgCntFltAllowed.description: Total number of URLs intercepted and allowed by a content filtering object.

clvHttpAlgCntFltBlocked.name: clvHttpAlgCntFltBlocked
clvHttpAlgCntFltBlocked.description: Total number of URLs intercepted and blocked by a content filtering object.

clvSmtpAlgEntry.name: clvSmtpAlgEntry
clvSmtpAlgEntry.description: A row of the table of SMTP ALG objects.

clvSmtpAlgIndex.name: clvSmtpAlgIndex
clvSmtpAlgIndex.description: The index of an entry of the Table of SMTP ALG objects.

clvSmtpAlgName.name: clvSmtpAlgName
clvSmtpAlgName.description: The name of an SMTP ALG object.

clvSmtpAlgTotCheckedSes.name: clvSmtpAlgTotCheckedSes
clvSmtpAlgTotCheckedSes.description: Total sessions checked by the SMTP ALG of corresponding index.

clvSmtpAlgTotSpamSes.name: clvSmtpAlgTotSpamSes
clvSmtpAlgTotSpamSes.description: Total spam sessions detected by the SMTP ALG of corresponding index.

clvSmtpAlgTotDroppedSes.name: clvSmtpAlgTotDroppedSes
clvSmtpAlgTotDroppedSes.description: Total deroped sessions for the SMTP ALG of corresponding index.

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlTable.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlTable
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlTable.description: Table of SMTP ALG DNS balck list objects.

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlEntry.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlEntry
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlEntry.description: A row of the table of SMTP ALG DNS black list objects.

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlIndex.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlIndex
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlIndex.description: The index of an entry of the SMTP ALG DNS black list objects.

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlName.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlName
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlName.description: The SMTP DNS black list name.

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlChecked.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlChecked
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlChecked.description: Total sessions checked againt SMTP ALG DNS black list of corresponding index

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlMatched.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlMatched
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlMatched.description: Total sessions that matched SMTP ALG DNS black list of corresponding index

clvSmtpAlgDnsBlFailChecks.name: clvSmtpAlgDnsBlFailChecks
clvSmtpAlgDnsBlFailChecks.description: Total failed checks for the SMTP ALG DNS black list of corresponding index

clvDHCPRelayCurClients.name: clvDHCPRelayCurClients
clvDHCPRelayCurClients.description: Total DHCP relay active relayed clients.

clvDHCPRelayRuleEntry.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleEntry
clvDHCPRelayRuleEntry.description: Entry of the table of DHCP relay rules

clvDHCPRelayRuleIndex.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleIndex
clvDHCPRelayRuleIndex.description: Index of the table of DHCP relay rules.

clvDHCPRelayRuleName.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleName
clvDHCPRelayRuleName.description: Display name of a DHCP relay rule

clvDHCPRelayRuleHits.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleHits
clvDHCPRelayRuleHits.description: Number of the times the DHCP relay rule with corresponding index was used.

clvDHCPRelayRuleCurClients.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleCurClients
clvDHCPRelayRuleCurClients.description: Number of ctive relayed clients by the DHCP relay rule with corresponding index.

clvDHCPRelayRuleRejCliPkts.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleRejCliPkts
clvDHCPRelayRuleRejCliPkts.description: Number of client packets rejected by a rule.

clvDHCPRelayRuleRejSrvPkts.name: clvDHCPRelayRuleRejSrvPkts
clvDHCPRelayRuleRejSrvPkts.description: Number of DHCP server packets rejected by the DHCP relay rule with the corresponding index.

clvHASyncSendQueueLength.name: clvHASyncSendQueueLength
clvHASyncSendQueueLength.description: Size of the queue used for the High Availability sync interface.

clvHASyncSendQueueUsagePackets.name: clvHASyncSendQueueUsagePackets
clvHASyncSendQueueUsagePackets.description: High Availability Sync interface queue usage in number of packets.

clvHASyncSendQueueUsageOctects.name: clvHASyncSendQueueUsageOctects
clvHASyncSendQueueUsageOctects.description: High Availability Sync interface queue usage in number of octects.

clvHASyncSentPackets.name: clvHASyncSentPackets
clvHASyncSentPackets.description: Number High Availability packets sent on Sync.

clvHASyncSendResentPackets.name: clvHASyncSendResentPackets
clvHASyncSendResentPackets.description: Number of High Availability packets resent on Sync.
